title: UCIL Announces New Mining Expansion in Jaduguda
content: UCIL has announced a new uranium mining project in Jaduguda, raising concerns among environmental groups about its potential impact.

title: Villagers Report Health Issues Near UCIL Sites
content: Residents in nearby villages have reported a rise in health problems, possibly linked to radiation exposure from UCIL operations.

title: NGO Files Petition Against UCIL in High Court
content: A Jharkhand-based NGO has filed a petition alleging UCIL's violations of environmental safety regulations.

title: UCIL's Safety Audit Report Released
content: The recent safety audit of UCIL facilities indicates mixed results, highlighting both improvements and persisting challenges.

title: Protests Continue Over UCIL's Proposed Expansion
content: Local communities have staged demonstrations demanding a halt to UCIL's expansion plans until proper health safeguards are ensured.
